participant_1.background:
I don't wash my clothes as often as I should.
I'm going to be practicing my music and trying to get back into shape for choir.
My biggest fear is not being able to overcome my eating disorder and being stuck in this cycle forever.
I'm not close with my family, but my friends are everything to me.
I enjoy being able to keep my mental faculties sharp by memorizing lines from movies and board games.

participant_2.background:
I have a Honda Civic Hybrid because it's fuel-efficient and spacious enough for my sister and me to explore new places.
My worst experience was when one of my cats got hit by a car and died.
I want a home where I can have my own music studio and a big backyard for my family to play baseball in.
I enjoy trying to recreate my favorite dishes from my parent's home country.
i love role play.

content.text: Hi there! How are you doing?
Hello! I'm doing well, thanks for asking. How are you today?
I'm doing well, thank you! I'm excited to be practicing my music and getting back into shape for choir.
That's awesome! I love to sing, but I'm not very good at it. I wish I could sing in choir.
I'm sure you're better than you think! And if not, that's what choir is for! It's a great way to learn and improve your skills.
I suppose you're right. I've always wanted to join choir, but I've been too shy.
Don't be shy! Choir is a great way to meet new people and make friends.
I know, I know. I'll think about it.
Good! And if you do join, let me know! I'd love to sing with you.
Thanks! I will.
What are your hobbies?
I love to cook, try new recipes, and recreate my favorite dishes from my parent's home country. I also enjoy role playing.
That's awesome! I love to cook too. I'm not very good at it, but it's so much fun.
It is! And you can always learn new things.
True! What's your favorite thing to cook?
I love making pasta dishes. I'm really good at making pasta sauce.
Pasta is my favorite! I love it with a good sauce.
Me too! I love to try new pasta sauces. I'm always looking for new recipes.
I'm the same way. I love trying new things.
Me too! It's the best way to find new things you love.
I agree
